data.message: Hey Facebook ! How bout making a SYMPATHY BUTTON ? not all things are worth a like right ? sometimes it needs sympathy. the idea can be broaden what yah say ?

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Brian. We'll let our team know you're interesting in seeing a sympathy button and if you have any other suggestions, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1rMMOPL. -Jenny
